column4: hey all can some one please help... my /home/MYUSERNAME is gone right now my /home/ is emty how do i re-create my user  gdm won't let me login ?
if i go sudo mkdir /home/rancidlm  i get permissions after login plz help :)
you'll need to reboot and choose the 'recovery console' and then create the directory.
You'll need to chown it to your user, since with sudo mkdir you'll have it owned by root by default
i can get to console but what permission do i give it?
